Original: 鶯歌產地開放日~10/11在小市集的紅屋吃到腰瘦好吃的捲餅和黑松露脆餅。舌尖的滿足啊!推紅屋小帥廚廚藝精湛!下次去店裏吃大餐!

Original:
鶯歌少見的餐酒館，環境很寬敞舒適，氣氛相當不錯，老闆娘一人吧台兼外場，服務周到，點餐時提醒，因為有小孩用餐，會注意菜品的辣度調整
剝皮辣椒雞義大利麵，重口味、醬汁跟麵體融入，收汁也剛好，甜鹹辣的味道，很看個人喜好，雞肉不至於乾柴有點像鹹酥雞一樣
牛肝蕈菇燉飯（焗烤另+40元），滿滿滿的起司牽絲，燉飯調味屬清淡飲食
玫瑰奶茶味道不錯，淡淡玫瑰香不會過甜
綜合炸物，薯條、雞塊、炸魚、雞米花、熱狗、雞翅*2
另外開胃的炒菇（鴻禧菇、香菇、杏鮑菇）、炒蛤蜊（L）都算推薦
EN:
Yingge's rare dining tavern, the environment is very spacious and comfortable, and the atmosphere is quite good.
Peeling pepper chicken pasta, heavy taste, sauce and mask bodies, the sauce is just right, the sweet and spicy taste, it depends on personal preferences, chicken is a bit like salty chicken
Beef liver mushroom stewed rice (grilled another+40 yuan), full of cheese, stewed rice flavor is a light diet
Rose milk tea tastes good, a touch of rose fragrance will not be too sweet
Comprehensive fried objects, fries, chicken pieces, fried fish, chicken rice, hot dogs, chicken wings*2
In addition, appetizing mushrooms (Hongxi mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, Pleurotus eryngii) and fried clams (L) are all recommended

Original:
在一個沒有其他組客人的晚上去吃，本來還蠻期待的…
裝潢一百，但是餐點真的不太行…個人算是對義大利麵、排餐等等接受度很高，各種創意的西餐也都吃過，但真的是覺得各種基本面都不ok

副餐的濃湯…要先確定要叫他濃湯欸…很稀，口味也是台式的那種「濃湯」，一般西式的濃湯應該會用馬鈴薯或是「roux」加強濃度，但這裡的比較感受不到

One hundred decoration, but the meal is really not very good ... I have high acceptance of pasta, meals and so on. I have eaten all kinds of creative western food, but I really think that all kinds of fundamentals are not OK
The soft shell crab is very small, it doesn't matter, but the oil is not drained, and the crispy taste of the fried object should not have. The pasta itself is not very good.

The content of the frying platter is the same. It feels that you need to grab the crispy and drain oil before the pan, so that the guests will have a better feeling

The soup of the side meal ... It must be determined first to call him the thick soup ... very sparse, the taste is also the "thick soup" of the desktop. Generally, the western soup should be used to enhance the concentration with potatoes or "Roux", but here I can't feel it

傻爆眼的服務...一進去店裡的時候沒主動帶位就算了，上前詢問一位看似店長的女服務生，她只用手指頭指著旁邊的位置，短短的回：“那邊“  但因為我先生已經去停車了我只好將就繼續選擇在這裡用餐。隨後因為這樣我整個情緒都不好了，後來想說這裡有吧檯詢問一下有生啤嗎，結果連基本的生啤也沒有..後來點了一杯調酒竟然是常溫的？我和先生吃完兩盤意大利麵後才發現蛤蜊怎麼還沒上，先生幫忙上去詢問，對方竟然只回答："哦，  "  然後就走進廚房？？
超級傻眼，當下我忍不住拿出手機給了一星評論，結果看似店長的女服務生竟然走出來放下盤子問：妳憑什麼給我一顆星？
我當下真的嚇到，從來沒遇過這種狀況，我本能回覆：不是我
結果她竟然說: 敢作敢當啦！是的就是我，而且我現在就是回來好好找時間把當天的狀況寫下，
評論就寫到這裡..懇請要去這家餐廳用餐的大大們都要三思。
EN:
Silly -eyed service ... When I went in the store, I did n’t take the initiative to bring the position. I stepped forward and asked a female waiter who seemed to be a manager. : "Over there" but because my husband had stopped, I had to choose to eat here.Later, because my whole mood was not good, I wanted to say that there is a bar here to ask if there is a raw beer, but there is no basic beer .. Later, it turned out that it was room temperature to order a glass of bartender?After eating two sets of pasta with my husband, I found out why the clam was not yet on. The husband helped go to ask, and the other party only answered: "Oh," Then I walked into the kitchen?Intersection
I was super dumbfounded. At the moment, I couldn't help taking out my mobile phone and gave a star comment. As a result, the female waiter of the store manager came out and put down the plate and asked: Why do you give me a star?
I was really scared now, I have never encountered this situation, I instinct to reply: Not me
As a result, she said: Dare to do it!Yes, it's me, and I just come back and find the time to write down the situation of the day.
